text: قيل ادخل الجنة قال يليت قومى يعلمون

translations.translation: He was told, 'Enter the Garden!' He said, 'If my people only knew
(But they stoned him to death.) It was said to him: "Enter Paradise;" and he said: "If only my people knew
(Eventually they killed him and he was told): “Enter Paradise.” The man exclaimed: “Would that my people knew
(Having been murdered by the disbelievers) he was told to enter paradise
It was said to him, “Enter Paradise”; he said, “If only my people knew!”
It was said: "Enter Paradise." He said: "Would that my people knew."
It was said: Enter the garden. He said: O would that my people had known
It was said, 'Enter Paradise!' He said, 'Ah, would that my people had knowledge
It was said (unto him): Enter paradise. He said: Would that my people knew
We said to him, "Enter paradise," and he exclaimed: "Would that my people knew
It was said: enter thou the Garden. He said: would that my people knew.
He was told, ‘Enter paradise!’ He said, ‘Alas! Had my people only known
It was said: "Enter thou the Garden." He said: "Ah me! Would that my People knew (what I know)!-
It was said (to him when the disbelievers killed him): "Enter Paradise." He said: "Would that my people knew!
It was said (to him): 'Enter Paradise' and he said: 'Would that my people knew
It was said, “Enter Paradise.” He said, “If only my people knew.
It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish my people could know

[36:26] It was said, to him upon his death: ‘Enter Paradise!’ — but it is also said that he entered it while he was [still] alive. He said, ‘O (yā is for calling attention [to something]), would that my people knew

(It was said (unto him): Enter Paradise) Paradise was decreed for him; it is also said: it was said to his spirit: enter Paradise. (He said) his spirit said after entering Paradise: (Would that my people knew) and believed

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
وأدركته الكرامة القدسية حيث { قِيلَ } له من قبل الحق حينئذ: اخرج من هوؤتك وانخلع من أنانيتك { ٱدْخُلِ ٱلْجَنَّةَ } أي: فضاء الوحدة التي لا فيها وصب ولا نصب 
 ولا عناء ولا تعب
 فخرج وانخلع
 فدخل على الفور واتصل
 ثم بعدما وصل إلى ما وصل { قَالَ } متمنياً
 متحسراً لقومه بعدما لحق بفضاء الوصال: { يٰلَيْتَ قَوْمِي يَعْلَمُونَ } [يس: 26]


{ بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي } وانكشف علي وجذبني نحوه بعدما ستر عني أنانيتي ومحا مني هويتي { وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ } [يس: 27] المكرمين: الآمنين الفائزين المستبشرين الذين
[يونس: 62]
